title: Data Structures & Algorithms in Python
description: Master Data Structures & Algorithms using Python Programming! Learn to implement DSA such as: String, hashing, DP, & more in Python Language. Master DSA fundamentals now in Python & Start Learning Today!

instructor.name: Sandeep Jain
instructor.about: Mr. Sandeep Jain graduated from Dr. Abdul Kalam Technical University with a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering. He completed his Master's degree from IIT-Roorkee and has worked as a full-time Software Developer at D.E. Shaw & Co. His passion for teaching led him to join JIIT Noida as an Assistant Professor.

you-will-learn: Advanced DS such as: Linked Lists, Heaps, Graph etc
Analysis of Algorithms: Best, Average and Worst Cases, Big O Notation, Space Complexity etc
How to solve DSA problems using Python
How to become an efficient problem-solver
DSA questions and concepts
benefit: Course Completion Certificate trusted by top companies

course-content.title: Introduction
content: Analysis of Algorithms, Asymptotic Analysis, Order of Growth, Best, Average and Worst Cases, Asymptotic Notations and more.

course-content.title: Mathematics
content: Python DSA - Count Digits, Palindrome Number, Factorial of a number, Trailing Zeros in Factorial, GCD and HCF of two numbers and more.
Important Practice Problems

course-content.title: Bit Magic
content: Bitwise Operator in Python, Check Kth bit is set or not, Count Set Bits, Power of Two, One Odd Occuring and more.
Important Practice Problems

course-content.title: List
content: Basic - Introduction, Working of List in Python, Average or Mean of a List, Separate Even and Odd, Get Smaller Elements and more
Advanced - Left Rotate by d Places, Maximum difference, Stock Buy &Sell, Trapping Rainwater, Maximum Consecutive 1s and more
Important Practice Problems

course-content.title: Recursion
content: Basic - Applications of Recursion, Writing Base Cases in Recursion, Tail Recursion, Practice For Recursion and more.
Advanced - Subset of a given string, Printing all Permutations, Tower of Hanoi in Python, Josephus Problem in Python and more.
Important Practice Problems

course-content.title: Searching
content: Basics - Binary Search in Python, Recursive Binary Search in Python, Analysis of Binary Search, Index of first occurrence in a sorted array and more.
Advanced - Search in Sorted Rotated Array, Median of two sorted arrays, Repeating Elements Part, Allocate Minimum Pages (Naive Method, Binary Search)
Important Practice Problems
